Body:
with pytest.raises(IntervalExceptions.WrongBoundsException):
    _ = Interval(1, -1)
i = Interval(1, 2)
i.lb = 1.5
assert_almost_equal(i.lb, 1.5)
with pytest.raises(IntervalExceptions.WrongBoundsException):
    i.lb = 3
i.ub = 1.9
assert_almost_equal(i.ub, 1.9)
with pytest.raises(IntervalExceptions.WrongBoundsException):
    i.ub = 0
